entry.title: ABAP Cloud trail account: Getting error when doing preview of application
entry.content:
I am trying to create a new services for RAP app on CDS, but preview of app is not working, this issue is only for newly created service, old services are working fine. The error in Feeder is : 

Saturday, October 25, 2025, 6:41:52‚ÄØAM IST

entry.title: SAP RAP & Analytical List Page - How to group and sort by grouped summed values?
entry.content:
Hey developers!

 

I've just managed to develop my first Analytical List Page which consumes data from a RAP service. 

 

I'm curious how to group the values of the lineitems and sort them by the summarized value. The default sorting does not have any effect when the entries are grouped.

 

In below view, I've grouped my data based on the "rolename". Each rolename has multiple entries which all contain an integer value. 

The grouping already shows the summed values.

Although sorting descending is configured, the summed values per group are not sorted.

Is there any way to achieve this?

 

Greetings!

entry.title: getting 403 forbidden error in sap rap service url
entry.content:
Hi team,

i have created my first rap application in abap hana trail account setted up recently. its a simple read only application with two cds views, no biz logic. When i m clicking on service url its showing "403 Forbidden The request has been blocked by UCON. Server time: 2025-10-27 09:19:27" and metadata in rap application is also failing. Can you please let me know the root cause and solution.

BR,Shubh

entry.title: Displaying Serial numbers in custom cds views Report
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I‚Äôm currently working on a custom CDS view/report in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and would like to display serial numbers (for materials) in the output. Could anyone please guide me on the best approach to achieve this? Specifically, I‚Äôm looking for:

  1. How to include serial numbers in custom CDS views (built in Eclipse ADT).
  2. Whether it‚Äôs possible to fetch and display them directly through released data sources or associations.
  3. Any alternative methods (e.g., using standard I_* views, extensibility options, or Fiori analytical queries) to display serial numbers in reports.

entry.title: Mass Upload functionality for a custom table in ADT
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I‚Äôm trying to create a table in ADT and  generated an app from it to input data. I also want to add a mass upload functionality using Excel. I have a few questions regarding the best approach:

  1. Can I implement the Excel upload without using BAS, by using actions in the Behavior Definition?

  2. If I use BAS, can I start with a List Report template and later add the Excel upload functionality?

Could you please guide me on how this can be achieved?

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Research and Development  ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model SAP Business Application Studio

entry.title: abap rap managed scenario - deletion of associated entity - foreign keys etc.
entry.content:
Hello experts,

Can you explain me, how the foreign keys in db are expected to work in abap rap?

Use case: I am creating simple managed rap scenario for job application management. To each application can be associated company and contact person. Respective foreign keys are defined in the application db table as well. Records for company table are managed from separate rap/fiori application.

When I create a job application record with associated company I would expect the hana will prevent deletion of the company (because of the foreign key usage in application table). But I can delete the respective company ...

Am I missing anything?

Thank you in advance for your insight ...

Regards,

Radim

entry.title: With reference to PO how to create auto GRN using background job in sap public cloud(3SL)
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am working in an SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3-System Landscape) environment, and I have a requirement to automatically post Goods Receipt (GRN) with reference to a Purchase Order using a scheduled/background job.

In standard SAP Public Cloud, we already have the ‚ÄúSchedule Goods Receipt for Inbound Deliveries‚Äù job, but in my case the business requirement is to post GR directly from the Purchase Order (without using Inbound Delivery).

If anyone has implemented a similar solution in 3SL‚Äîsuch as creating a RAP background job, using a released API, or integrating through the Material Documents API‚Äîplease share your experience or guidance.

Thank you!

entry.title: How to add dynamically rows programmatically in RAP managed List report
entry.content:
I have a RAP managed custom application (which is intended to be a List report without CRUD operations , only display) and data is coming from the CDS view entities like we have typically.

Now I have a requirement, where in the list report , I have to manually create rows with some custom logic (not necessary append , as the rows can be inserted anywhere in the original list report coming from CDS). I cannot use another CDS with UNION because the logic for the rows requires some ABAP coding (coming from custom FM).

Is there any way I can insert these rows before its displayed to the user.

entry.title: Need Free Study Materials and Resources for C_ABAPD_2507 (ABAP Cloud Developer Certification)
entry.content:
Hello Everyone, 

I‚Äôm currently preparing for the **C_ABAPD_2507 ‚Äì SAP Certified Associate ‚Äì ABAP Cloud** certification exam and I‚Äôm looking for **free materials or resources** to help with my preparation.

Could anyone please share:
- Links to **free study materials**, **blogs**, or **videos** related to ABAP Cloud?
- Any **practice questions** or **sample tests** available on SAP Learning Hub (free edition) or SAP Community?
- Tips on which **topics to focus on**, such as **CDS views**, **RAP model**, **ABAP RESTful programming**, **ABAP on BTP**, or **Fiori integration**?

Also, if anyone who has already cleared this exam can share their **study plan or experience**, that would be really helpful.

Thank you in advance for your support and guidance! 

@ABAP Cloud

@ABAP Development 

@ SAP Certification 

@Learning Journey 

@C_ABAPD_250

**Best regards,**
*Arsath Deen*

entry.title: Restrict Search Event for SmartFilterbar : SAP V4 RAP based OData Service
entry.content:
Hi Experts.

regarding of user validation request, the application should enforce validation on the SmartFilterBar to ensure users provide a value for at least one of the two filter fields‚ÄîID or Agency‚Äîbefore a search can proceed. If both fields are left empty, the system must display a clear error message informing the user that at least one filter parameter is required (for example: ‚ÄúPlease provide at least one filter: ID or Agency‚Äù) and must not initiate any backend requests until the input meets this requirement.

Process followed:

  • Created a controller extension using the Page Map.
  • In the override, attached logic to the SmartFilterBar‚Äôs onSearch event.
  • Used getFilterConditions to validate inputs and display an error message when needed.

Issue:

  • Calling oEvent.preventDefault() inside the handler does not stop the request; the backend OData call still executes.

Application Information:

  • SAP Fiori Elements application using a RAP-based OData service.

How can I stop the backend call from executing despite invoking oEvent.preventDefault() in the SmartFilterBar search handler?

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: RAP Later Numbering of multiple instances; matching child entries to parent entries
entry.content:
I have a BDEF that uses late numbering and looks as follows:

managed implementation in class /ipn/bp_i_checklisttype unique;
strict ( 2 );

define behavior for /IPN/I_ChecklistType alias ChecklistType
persistent table eam_cl_cu_type
lock master
authorization master ( instance )
late numbering
{
  create;
  field (readonly) ChecklistType;
  update;
  delete;
  association _Text { create; }
  mapping for eam_cl_cu_type
  {
    ChecklistType = cl_type;
    Inactive = inactive;
  }
}

define behavior for /IPN/I_ChecklistTypeText alias ChecklistTypeText
persistent table EAM_CL_CU_TYPT
lock dependent by _ChecklistType
authorization dependent by _ChecklistType
late numbering
{
  update;
  field (readonly:update) ChecklistType, Language;
  delete;
  association _ChecklistType;
  mapping for EAM_CL_CU_TYPT
  {
    ChecklistType = cl_type;
    Language = spras;
    ChecklistTypeText = cl_type_text;
  }
}

The problem is, when I try and create more than one instance at once, e.g. with the following test code:

    MODIFY ENTITY /ipn/i_checklisttype
      CREATE FIELDS ( inactive )
      WITH VALUE #(
          ( %cid = 'cid1' %control-inactive = if_abap_behv=>mk-on  inactive = '' )
          ( %cid = 'cid2' %control-inactive = if_abap_behv=>mk-on  inactive = '' )
       )
       CREATE BY \_text
       FIELDS ( language checklisttypetext ) "ChecklistType
       WITH VALUE #(
            ( %cid_ref = 'cid1' %target = VALUE #( ( %cid = 'cid1.1' language = sy-langu checklisttypetext = 'Test created with EML' ) ) )
            ( %cid_ref = 'cid2' %target = VALUE #( ( %cid = 'cid2.1' language = sy-langu checklisttypetext = 'Test created with EML' ) ) )

       )
      FAILED   DATA(mod_failed)
      REPORTED DATA(mod_reported)
      MAPPED   DATA(mod_mapped).

When it reaches the ADJUST_NUMBERS method in the implementation class, there is no reliable way to tie back the child entries (ChecklistTypeText) to the respective headers (ChecklistType).

In the example above, it is not a problem, since there is one child (text) entry per header, but if I were to have multiple child entries per header, I would not be able to tell which child belongs to which header.

The only identifier that is passed along to the ADJUST_NUMBERS method in the MAPPED structure is a GUID in %PID, but this is unique on every record, so it does not allow me to tie back an individual child to its header.

entry.title: UI.HEADERINFO: TypeNamePlural is mandatory
entry.content:
Hi ABAP/Fiori Devs,

I am facing a recurring issue ABAP Repository Objects Generator on BTP ABAP Environment / Fiori Tools List report wizard.  I have a manual fix for that, but there might be a trick to prevent this instructing SAP code generators. Nevertheless, You can use the below manual fix as well.

Using the generated UI V4 service in the List Report template in Business Application Studio I get metadata.xml issues. It is complaining about missing annotations.
The generated CDS metadata extension does not contain typeName and typeNamePlural annotations by default, so I added them manually.

.headerInfo: { title: { type: #STANDARD, value: 'MaterialID' },
                  description: { type: #STANDARD, value: 'MaterialName' },
                  typeName: 'Material',
                  typeNamePlural: 'Materials' }

It fixes the issue after refreshing the metadata in BAS.

I wonder someone knows the trick to prevent this issue without manual post-processing. Please do not hesitate to share it here üññ.
Thank You, Attila

entry.title: How to create an excel upload and read functionality in RAP
entry.content:
I have a requirement where i need to develop a fiori app (preferably using Fiori Element + RAP) where user gets an option to upload Excel file and when he uploads, it should trigger an event where I can write my logic to read the data from excel and do my abap operations on it.

 

I think there is an annotation @Semantics.largeobject to have an excel import option created in UI via fiori elements but as per understanding , it will directly upload the excel data in DB (as RAWstring) . In my case, I dont want to store the excel data in DB , just want some abap related event/method to trigger where I can my custom abap code to read this and do the processing I want.

@Semantics.largeObject:
      { mimeType: 'MimeType',
      fileName: 'Filename',

Any help, would be appreciated üôÇ

entry.title: BTP Trial Account RAP Application's Preview feature Not Working, returning 403 Http Status
entry.content:
Hello all,

We are trying to create a simple RAP list application in BTP Trial Account (Subaccount hosted in US EAST AWS), but noticed that the preview of the UI is not working and rendering as a blank object. It's noted that Error code 403 forbidden is being returned from the back-end network calls,

We observed that when we try to preview any of the SAP shipped sample programs like the one belonging to /DMO/FLIGHT , things work fine and this Network call is executed without any issues.

Is anyone facing this issue ? and is there any other solution rather than deleting the subaccount and creating a new one with the Singapore Azure Services opted ?

It seems already many are facing this issue:

1.) https://community.sap.com/t5/enterprise-resource-planning-q-a/sap-btp-trial-account-published-services-not-working/qaq-p/14216629

2.) https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/i-am-getting-a-blank-page-when-i-preview-my-rap-service-binding-in-the-btp/qaq-p/14244244

No idea why SAP is paying no heed to these systems which are surely used by lot of developers for Up-skilling, Training, POC Sample application creation and lot such activities.

Thanks,

Sijin

entry.title: Trial System not available for Restful ABAP development
entry.content:
Currently it is not possible to do Restful ABAP development on Trial Systems.

You cannot test the published OData service as you get errors.

When will the Trial system be fully available again?

It is so much annoying to work on a system that is not fully functional and you do not know, what the problem is..
